definitions.title: n.f.pl.
definitions.body: neck (on format. cf. Ba:NB 204)—[[גַּרְגְּרׂתֶָיךָ]] Pr 1:9, Pr 3:22, [[גַּרְגְרוֹתֶָךָ]] Pr 3:3, [[גַּרְגְּרׂתֶָךָ]] Pr 6:21—always in fig., instruction of parents an ornament, a chain upon neck Pr 1:9, bind them upon thy neck Pr 6:21; so of mercy & truth Pr 3:3, cf. v:Pr 3:22.
